Collection Class

A Class for working with a STAC Collection object

Constructor Arguments

NameTypeDefaultDescription
jsonjsonREQUIRED: The raw json of the stac entity
url(string|null)nullThe url of the stac entity
parent(StacEntity|null)nullThe parent class that created this stac entity
linkThatCreatedThis(json|null)nullThe entire link object that loaded the json

Properties

NameReturnsDescription
stacType
stringGets the Stac Type of 'Collection'
collectionItemsLink
JSONGets the Link object to the collections items using the items relationship.
numberOfProviders
numberGets the number of providers
id
stringThe id of the stac entity
rawJson
jsonThe json of the stac entity as originally retrieved. This object is frozen to prevent modification.
url
(string|null)The base url of the stac entity (similar to linkToSelf)
parent
(StacEntity|null)The parent stac entity class
linkThatCreatedThis
(json|null)The json link object that was used to create this stac entity
titleOrId
stringGets a string of either the title, or if not present, the id
title
(string|null)Gets a string of either the title, or if not present null
descriptionAsHtml
(string|null)Gets a description as rendered html using commonmark, or null
linkToSelf
(string|null)Gets this stac entity's url
hasParent
booleanA boolean indicating if a parent link is found in the raw json
linkToParent
(string|null)If present the parent's link url, or null
isRoot
booleanA boolean indicating if this entity represents the root entity
hasRoot
booleanA boolean indicating if this entity has a root entity
linkToRoot
(string|null)If present the parent's root url, or null
parentIsRoot
booleanA boolean indicating if the parent entity is the root entity
hasAssets
booleanA boolean indicating if entity has assets
numberOfAssets
numberThe number of assets present. If none then 0 is returned
thumbnailUrl
(string|null)The url of the asset that has a thumbnail role. Returns null if doesn't not exist
overviewUrl
(string|null)The url of the asset that has a overview role. Returns null if doesn't not exist
validHttpThumbnailUrl
(string|null)A valid http url for the thumbnail asset, if it exists.
validHttpOverviewUrl
(string|null)A valid http url for the overview asset, if it exists.
parentType
(string|null)Gets the type of parent stac entity. One of either 'Catalog', 'Collection' or 'Item'.
licenseTypeAndLink
(Object|null)Returns an object containing licenseName and link. If license is not available then null.
supportsFilterExtension
booleanA boolean indicating if entity supports the filter extension for searching.
childrenLoaded
booleanWhether the children references have been loaded.
items
Array <Item>An array of Item classes, populated once the children are loaded.
catalogs
Array <Catalog>An array of Catalog classes, populated once the children are loaded.
collections
Array <Collection>An array of Catalog classes, populated once the children are loaded.
hasSomeChildren
booleanReturns a boolean indicating that children exist
numberOfChildren
numberReturns the number of child links found in the raw JSON
childCatalogOrCollectionLinks
Array <JSON>Returns an array of links to children of the entity. These could be collections or catalogs.
childrenItemLinks
Array <JSON>Returns an array of links to Item's
numberOfItems
(number|null)The total number of items present in the collection or search results. Requires checkTotalNumberOfItems to be called to be called. Note: some STAC API's implementations do not return this information.
activeItemsCollectionPage
(ItemCollection|null)The most recent ItemCollection that has been loaded
queryablesLoaded
booleanA boolean indicating if the queryables have been loaded for the STAC Entity using the retrieveQueryables method
queryablesJson
JSONThe raw json from the queryables endpoint
queryablesArray
Array An array of Queryable instances for the STAC Entity
queryablesLink
stringPredicts the queryables URL for the STAC Entity
bbox
Array <number>Gets the first bbox property of the ExtentObject.
bboxAsGeojsonFeature
JSONGets the bbox as a GeoJSON Polygon object

Methods

NameReturnsDescription
createSearch()
SearchCreates a new Search Class pre-populated to search this collection.
loadParent()
Promise <(StacEntity|null)>Loads (if required) and returns the parent as it's StacEntity Class.
loadRoot()
Promise <(StacEntity|null)>Loads (if required) and returns the root entity as it's StacEntity Class.
getChildById(
   string
)
(StacEntity|null)Returns a STAC Entity from the children
limit(
   number
)
thisSets the limit parameter for how many items will be included in the response.
checkTotalNumberOfItems()
Promise <(number|null)>Sends a request to check the total number of items present in the collection or search results by limiting the result count to 1 and using the numberMatched field in the response. Note: some STAC API's implementations do not return the numberMatched information. TODO: Extend to also use Context Extension where present.
loadActiveItemCollection(
   (json|null)
)
Promise <(ItemCollection|null)>Loads a page of results, returning an ItemCollection.
retrieveQueryables()
Promise <JSON>Loads (if required) and returns the the queryables JSON, and sets queryablesLoaded to true.
getQueryableById(
   
)
QueryableGets a Queryable instance by its ID
